snippet: Christopher Russell, one of 10 artists commissioned by the M.T.A. to enhance the subways in Brooklyn, designed bronze gates depicting honeybees crawling on hives.
abstract: Christopher Russell, one of 10 artists commissioned by the Metropolitan Transportation Authority to enhance the subways in Brooklyn, describes what inspired him to design bronze gates depicting honeybees crawling on hives at the Ninth Avenue Station in Sunset Park.
lead_paragraph: Christopher Russell, one of 10 artists commissioned by the M.T.A. to enhance the subways in Brooklyn, designed bronze gates depicting honeybees crawling on hives.

headline.seo: A Sculptor Creates a Stop on the Bee Train — Q&A
headline.main: A Sculptor Creates a Stop on the Bee Train
headline.print_headline: A Subway Sculptor Creates a Stop on the Bee Train
